alert.note: Alert for Cascades in Lane County; Northern Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 04 at 3:05PM PDT until November 06 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM PDT SATURDAY TO 10 PM PST SUNDAY ABOVE 4500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 4500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 65 mph. * WHERE...In Oregon, Northern Oregon Cascades and Cascades in Lane County. In Washington, South Washington Cascades. * WHEN...From 11 PM PDT Saturday to 10 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map

area.areaDesc: Cascades in Lane County; Northern Oregon Cascades
